name: 'Cause Chaos
description:
Stick man brawler full of chaotic and funny physics.

WASD & Space to move.

1-4 number keys to switch hotbar slots.

Slot 1 = Draw: Use Ink - gained from slain enemies - to draw platforms, static and dynamic with left and right clicks.(Disappears after 5 secs.)

Slot 2 = Grapple: Fire ropes with left and right clicks.

Slot 3 = Sword: Hold Q or E to attack (May not show up at first - try switching off it and then back on...)

Slot 4 = Gun: Hold Q to aim and click to fire.

Esc to pause.

Try to kill as many enemies as possible before they kill you!

(Shot enemies have to be stabbed to count - don't know why...)

(Red bar is health, blue is Ink.)

Have fun, have a laugh, and hope you enjoy!

Thanks! :p
